overview: Sweetheart unveils their newest series, Lesbian In Charge, and finally gets comfortable showing the stronger, more dominant side of feminine erotica. Four tales of heat and aggression get built up to explosive climaxes with the industry's leading ladies. With wild performances by Dana DeArmond, Charley Chase, and Sinn Sage, and directed by Sweetheart's own Dana Vespoli, this movie is sure to challenge any ideas that women can't take charge. Directed by Dana Vespoli.
tagline: No one is in charge except these lustful girls!
title: Lesbians In Charge
